title: The Academic Job Search: Campus Visits
desc: The campus visit is probably the most integral part of the securing an academic job - once you have made it to the campus visit, it's really up to you to convey your fit with the department and school.? In this two hour session, Professor Anahid Nersessian from the UCLA Department of English will discuss the expectations of search committee members and faculty of candidates during the campus visit.? Dr. Nersessian speaks from years of experience on both sides of the academic job search and will provide key insights and advice.
